Uses of Interface
de.ntcomputer.minecraft.controllablemobs.api.actions.ControllableMobAction

  • Packages that use ControllableMobAction 
    Package Description
    de.ntcomputer.minecraft.controllablemobs.api  

    • Uses of ControllableMobAction in de.ntcomputer.minecraft.controllablemobs.api

      Methods in de.ntcomputer.minecraft.controllablemobs.api that return ControllableMobAction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.callback(Runnable runnable)
      Adds a callback to the action queue.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.die(boolean queue)
      The entity will die, optionally the created "action" will be added to the queue.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.follow(LivingEntity entity)
      The entity will follow another entity.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.follow(LivingEntity entity, boolean queue)
      The entity will follow another entity, optionally this action is added to the queue before executing.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.follow(LivingEntity entity, boolean queue, float radius)
      The entity will follow another entity, staying within the given radius, optionally this action is added to the queue before executing.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.follow(LivingEntity entity, boolean queue, float outerRadius, float targetRadius)
      The entity will follow another entity, staying inside the outerRadius and outside the targetRadius, optionally this action is added to the queue before executing.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.jump()
      The entity will jump one time.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.jump(boolean queue)
      The entity will jump one time, optionally the jump is added to the queue.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.jump(int times)
      The entity will jumps as many times as specified.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.jump(int times, boolean queue)
      The entity will jumps as many times as specified, optionally these jumps are added to the queue.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.lookAt(Entity entity)
      Orders the entity to look at the given other entity.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.lookAt(Entity entity, boolean queue)
      Orders the entity to look at the given other entity, optionally adding the action to the queue.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.lookAt(Location loc)
      Orders the entity to look at the given location.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.lookAt(Location loc, boolean queue)
      Orders the entity to look at the given location, optionally adding the action to the queue.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.moveTo(Location loc)
      Orders the entity to move to the given location.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.moveTo(Location loc, boolean queue)
      Orders the entity to move to the given location, optionally adding the action to the queue.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.target(LivingEntity entity)
      The given target is assigned to the entity.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.target(LivingEntity entity, boolean queue)
      The given target is assigned to the entity, optionally adding the action to the queue.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.wait(int serverTicks)
      Orders the entity to wait before executing following actions.
      ControllableMobAction ControllableMobActions.wait(int serverTicks, boolean queue)
      Orders the entity to wait before executing following actions, optionally this is added to the queue.
